thread.section_title: Oxygen Concentrator Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oxygen Concentrator Store | www.oxygenconcentratorstore.com
thread.title: john carlton
thread.title_full: Oxygen Concentrator Store reviewed by john carlton

author: john carlton
title: john carlton
text:
Bret could not have been more helpful explaining all the choices for POCs and home units. The indoor track helped my wife figure out best portable.
There was no rush to sell or get us on our way. home unit arrived on schedule as did followup order. Great company. Nothing like in N. Colorado. Will pass on Bret's name at next pulmonary appointment.
Thanks so much.
